tool_description: Video transcription and summarization as easy as an API call.
name: Video to Text - Video transcription and summarization
title: Video to Text - Video transcription and summarization
tool_name: Video to Text - Video transcription and summarization

api_list.name: New Job: Transcribe and Summarize Video
api_list.description:
This endpoint will receive an **MP4 public video URL** and will return a video transcription followed by a summary of that transcription.

> The video size must be less than 50MB.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://video-to-text-video-transcription-and-summarization.p.rapidapi.com/transcribe"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "video-to-text-video-transcription-and-summarization.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://video-to-text-video-transcription-and-summarization.p.rapidapi.com/transcribe"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "video-to-text-video-transcription-and-summarization.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
